jobs

Jobs related endpoints

hydra

Hydra prepared state Used to optimize first rendering by providing data that is needed to render the specific page.

Parameters

NameDescription
searchType *
string
(path)

Available values : own, all

Responses

CodeDescriptionLinks
200

Return html, config and prepared state js objects

Media type
Controls Accept header.
